revised_title: Examination of Gases Occluded in Meteoric Iron from Augusta County, Virginia
tldr: The author examines the gases released from meteoric iron found in Augusta County, Virginia, and compares the results to Graham's experiment on a meteorite from Lenarto, Hungary. The study reveals differences in the composition and amount of gases released from the two samples, with the Virginia iron producing a larger quantity of gas and a different composition of constituent gases.
